Tue Oct 19 11:53:11 2021

haar_test():
  Python version: 3.6.9
  Test haar().

haar_2d_test():
  haar_2d() computes the Haar transform of an array.
  haar_2d_inverse() inverts the transform.

  Input array U:

  Col:       0             1             2             3       
  Row
      0 :    0.177359      0.629969      0.747588      0.356188  
      1 :    0.768977      0.413412      0.508623      0.660691  
      2 :    0.294611       0.68426      0.374279      0.798402  
      3 :   0.0926146      0.736096       0.38811       0.18916  
      4 :    0.226259      0.169384      0.180146      0.543216  
      5 :     0.45921      0.291765      0.756428      0.762298  
      6 :    0.194301      0.698027     0.0500188      0.493189  
      7 :    0.722149      0.278724      0.290428      0.501432  
      8 :    0.528694      0.434007      0.627817      0.576474  
      9 :    0.287847      0.510254     0.0288253      0.395188  
     10 :    0.208814      0.827948      0.837581      0.616765  
     11 :    0.566285      0.782663      0.440517      0.278652  
     12 :     0.34254      0.457888      0.904408      0.547292  
     13 :    0.281537      0.386648      0.172194      0.956832  
     14 :    0.360039      0.997083      0.655021      0.101411  
     15 :    0.472812      0.842482      0.694836      0.921686
